abiDocs.name: claimOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer, as long as it is called within the specified start and end time.

inputs.name: _start
inputs.description: The earliest time ownership can be claimed.

inputs.name: _end
inputs.description: The latest time ownership can be claimed.

abiDocs.name: setLimits
abiDocs.details: Used to specify the time period during which a pending owner can claim ownership.

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
